title: Espresso
author: Sabrina Carpenter
lyrics:
[00:08.84] Now he's thinkin' 'bout me every night, oh
[00:12.48] Is it that sweet? I guess so
[00:14.55] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[00:16.83] That's that me espresso
[00:19.14] Move it up, down, left, right, oh
[00:21.58] Switch it up like Nintendo
[00:23.85] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[00:26.15] That's that me espresso
[00:28.57] I can't relate to desperation
[00:33.42] My give-a-damns are on vacation
[00:38.01] And I got this one boy and he won't stop calling
[00:42.61] When they act this way, I know I got 'em
[00:46.54] Too bad your ex don't do it for ya
[00:48.86] Walked in and dream-came-trued it for ya
[00:51.22] Soft skin and I perfumed it for ya (ha, ha, ha, ha, yes)
[00:56.12] I know I Mountain Dew it for ya (yes)
[00:58.13] That morning coffee, brewed it for ya (yes)
[01:00.51] One touch and I brand-newed it for ya, oh (ha, ha, ha, ha)
[01:03.87] And now he's thinkin' 'bout me every night, oh
[01:07.73] Is it that sweet? I guess so
[01:10.04] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[01:12.33] That's that me espresso
[01:14.78] Move it up, down, left, right, oh
[01:17.05] Switch it up like Nintendo
[01:19.40] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[01:21.44] That's that me espresso
[01:24.79] Holy -
[01:26.07] Is it that sweet? I guess so
[01:28.38] I'm working late 'cause I'm a singer
[01:33.28] Oh, he looks so cute wrapped 'round my finger
[01:37.90] My twisted humor make him laugh so often
[01:42.53] My honeybee, come and get this pollen
[01:46.47] Too bad your ex don't do it for ya
[01:49.06] Walked in and dream-came-trued it for ya
[01:51.36] Soft skin and I perfumed it for ya, oh (yeah, ha, ha, ha, ha, yes)
[01:55.91] I know I Mountain Dew it for ya (yes)
[01:58.34] That morning coffee, brewed it for ya (yes)
[02:00.62] One touch and I brand-newed it for ya (stupid)
[02:04.27] Now he's thinkin' 'bout me every night, oh
[02:07.81] Is it that sweet? I guess so
[02:10.16] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[02:12.48] That's that me espresso
[02:14.83] Move it up, down, left, right, oh
[02:16.89] Switch it up like Nintendo
[02:19.15] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[02:21.56] That's that me espresso (yes)
[02:23.81] Thinkin' 'bout me every night, oh
[02:26.18] Is it that sweet? I guess so (yes)
[02:28.48] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[02:30.89] That's that me espresso (yes)
[02:33.11] Move it up, down, left, right, oh (move it up, down, left, right, oh)
[02:35.41] Switch it up like Nintendo (yes)
[02:37.72] Say you can't sleep, baby, I know
[02:40.09] That's that me espresso
[02:44.66] Is it that sweet? I guess so
[02:48.02] Mm, that's that me espresso
